sentences.sContent: Feelings of guilt are deeply embedded in her personality.
sentences.sCn: 负罪感在她的性格里根深蒂固。

sentences.sContent: ...the process can embed small flaws in the genes of clones that scientists arc only now discovering...

synos.tran: 栽种；使嵌入，使插入；使深留脑中

phrases.pCn: 嵌入水印；嵌入水印滤镜

remMethod.val: em(进入…中) ＋ bed(床) → 把…嵌入床中 → 把…嵌入

trans.tranCn: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留脑中
trans.tranOther: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way
